extendedInfo.description: Drivers Ed! When can you cross a double yellow line to pass another vehicle? When can you drive in a bike lane? Where should pedestrians walk on a road without sidewalks? Play DrivingEdge(TM) USA and learn essential facts about driving (or DMV drivers license test) that every driver should know. This app is free and does not contain any annoying ads.This app is useful for the drivers who are preparing to take Drivers License test at Department of Motor Vehicles (DMV) in many States in the U.S.  The app has facts regarding driving personal motor vehicles such as car, SUV, truck etc. These facts are not only useful for new drivers but also for seasoned drivers who like to check their knowledge of the rules of the road. You are better prepared to face any road hazard or a DMV traffic ticket if you know your driving facts! Play DrivingEdge USA and build an edge that other drivers donât have.Keywords: Car, SUV, truck, driver permit, driver license, vehicle, department of public safety, traffic, ticket, road, hazard, driving, traffic ticket, traffic court, learner permit, Learner's permit

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: I love the flash cards the most.
reviews.author: Isabelle Rosas

reviews.title: Great tool
reviews.comment: I used this for the VA DMV permit test. I also read the book twice, listened to the audio book, and took the quizzes on the DMV site... This was my third time taking it and I passed missing only one question. This was a great app. Thanks to whoever created it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: DrivingEdge Car Driver License
reviews.comment: Excellent App; great for reviewing some of the more intricate details of driving in today\'s traffic as well as catch up on recent changes in any laws. Thank you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.comment: It gave a lot of the key questions but half of the test was not reviewed in the app. Definitely practice the book in addition.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very good app, helped me get.my license literally

reviews.title: I passed
reviews.comment: I live in Pa... Never read the manual, and just studied with the app.. Passed my learners permit on the first try... Get this if you want to pass...
